findings.title: Contract have interfaces with not audited realization
findings.description: The contract has interfaces with unrealized implementations that were not audited.

findings.title: Owner can add and remove minters
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to add and remove minters without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can add and remove operators
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to add and remove operators.

findings.title: Owner can change referral contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the referral contract.

findings.title: Minter can mint any tokens amount
findings.description: The Minter role has unrestricted access to minting tokens without any limitations on the amount.

findings.title: Operator can manually buyback, swap buyback and swap marketing
findings.description: The operator has excessive privileges to perform critical operations such as manual buybacks, swapping buybacks, and swapping marketing.

findings.title: Operator can change marketing address
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Operator can change marketingSwapEnabled value
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the marketingSwapEnabled value.

findings.title: Operator can change min and max marketing swap amount
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the minimum and maximum marketing swap amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator can enable/disable swapEnabled
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to enable or disable the swapEnabled feature.

findings.title: Operator can change min and max swap amount
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the minimum and maximum swap amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator can enable/disable buyback
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to enable or disable the buyback feature.

findings.title: Operator Privilege: Modifiable minBalanceRequired, minBuybackSellAmount, and maxBuybackAmount
findings.description: The operator has the capability to change critical parameters such as minBalanceRequired, minBuybackSellAmount, and maxBuybackAmount values, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator can set lpToken addresses
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to set lpToken addresses, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator can exclude from fee
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to exclude certain entities or transactions from fees.

findings.title: Operator can exclude from antiwhale
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from the anti-whale mechanism, potentially allowing them to manipulate the system.

findings.title: Operator can enable/disable antiwhale
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to enable or disable the anti-whale feature.
